stories.text:
Hi everyone, I was already talking about it on ItaliaPersonalFinance, I'm thinking of starting a small business to supplement my income.

The idea is to help other people improve or build from scratch their CV, resume (and LinkedIn profile) at a price yet to be determined. I would start with a couple of free consultations and then try to figure out the price at which to offer this service.

By now I have quite a bit of experience and also having some colleagues and friends in HR, I know that my work has actually brought some results.

Can I kindly hear your opinion?

Thank you!
